title: Mira Murati: The Brilliant Mind Behind ChatGPT | LUXONOMY
description: In the ever-evolving world of artificial intelligence, one name has emerged as a true visionary in the development of large language models: Mira Murati. As the architect of the groundbreaking ChatGPT, Murati has demonstrated an innate ability to harness the power of technology for the betterment of society. In this article, we delve into theâ€¦
